010package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
011
012/**
013 * This class defines static methods for gamma correction for sRGB which are
014 * used, e.g., by {@link LabColorSpace} and {@link LuvColorSpace} color spaces.
015 * Implemented with {@code double} variables for better accuracy.
016 * 
017 * @author WB
018 * @version 2022/09/01
019 */
020public abstract class sRgbUtil {
021        
022        private sRgbUtil() {}
023        
024        // specs according to official sRGB standard:
025        private static final double S = 12.92;
026        private static final double A0 = 0.0031308;
027        private static final double B0 = S * A0;        // 0.040449936
028        private static final double D = 0.055;
029        private static final double GAMMA = 2.4;
030        private static final double iGAMMA = 1.0 / GAMMA;
031        
032        /**
033         * Forward Gamma correction (from linear to non-linear component values) for sRGB.
034         * 
035         * @param lc linear component value in [0,1]
036         * @return gamma-corrected (non-linear) component value
037         */
038    public static double gammaFwd(double lc) {
039                return (lc <= A0) ?
040                        (lc * S) :
041                        ((1 + D) * Math.pow(lc, iGAMMA) - D);
042    }
043    
044    /**
045         * Inverse Gamma correction (from non-linear to linear component values) for sRGB.
046         * 
047         * @param nlc non-linear (Gamma-corrected) component value in [0,1]
048         * @return linear component value
049         */
050    public static double gammaInv(double nlc) {
051        return (nlc <= B0) ?
052                (nlc / S) :
053                        Math.pow((nlc + D) / (1 + D), GAMMA);
054    }
055    
056        public static float[] sRgbToRgb(float[] srgb) { // all components in [0,1]
057                float R = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[0]);
058                float G = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[1]);
059                float B = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[2]);
060                return new float[] { R, G, B };
061        }
062
063        public static float[] rgbToSrgb(float[] rgb) { // all components in [0,1]
064                float sR = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[0]);
065                float sG = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[1]);
066                float sB = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[2]);
067                return new float[] { sR, sG, sB };
068        }
069    
070}
